name: Dhaka Metro Map Project
desc: This project is a Java-based application that simulates a representation of the Dhaka Metro Map using graph data structures.

name: Smart Healthcare System (Dec 2024)
desc: This project is a machine learning-based web application designed to predict diseases based on symptoms provided by the user.

name: Travel Website (Jun 2024)
desc: This project is a web-based application that includes a variety of features implemented using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP.

name: Real-time Chat Application (Jun 2024)
desc: This project is a chat application built using JavaFX. It provides a user-friendly interface for real-time communication between clients and a server.

name: Text Editor Project (Dec 2022)
desc: A simple text editor application built using Java Swing. This project demonstrates the use of JMenu and JMenuItem to create a functional menu bar for file and editing operations.

name: OS Services Simulation using Shell Script (Jun 2024)
desc: This project simulates various Operating System services through a shell script, allowing users to explore and understand fundamental algorithms in OS concepts. It features simulations of CPU Scheduling Algorithms, Page Replacement Algorithms, and Contiguous Memory Allocation Algorithms.
